alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Spokane (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 7:30PM PDT until June 27 at 7:45PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM PDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND SOUTHWESTERN SPOKANE COUNTIES... At 729 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Medical Lake, or 10 miles west of Cheney, moving west at 10 mph. Large hail is especially likely just northeast of Tyler. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tyler. This includes Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 252 and 262. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
